creditline: The David and Margaret Christenson Endowment for Art Acquisition
department: Art of Africa and the Americas
description: diptych; left panel: painting in browns, greens, salmon of barren mountainous land forms; right panel: panel in relief with vertical slit at center; mottled brown; row of round blue gems and sparkling copper colored material inside slit
medium: Oil on canvas (left panel); steel mesh over acrylic, wax, plastic gems (right panel)
title: Venere Alpina
